question: I am currently enrolled in an off-exchange plan, and have already paid towards my deductible and out of pocket maximum; if I switch to a Virginia's Insurance Marketplace plan will the payments I have already made count towards my new plan?
text: I am currently enrolled in an off-exchange plan, and have already paid towards my deductible and out of pocket maximum; if I switch to a Virginia's Insurance Marketplace plan will the payments I have already made count towards my new plan?
